title: Video: Tigerwing – The Hunt
body:
Having dazzled with her debut EP, **Tigerwing**, aka Edmonton’s Sarah Kelly, has released the first visuals to accompany one of the three tracks, _The Hunt_.

It’s a fitting video, as disturbing and mildly psychotic as the track itself, whilst remaining beautiful produced. Check out the video below, and the full EP underneath that.

[Tigerwing- The Hunt](http://vimeo.com/70090553) from [sarah kelly](http://vimeo.com/user17111449) on [Vimeo](https://vimeo.com).
